titles.title: 3D Reference Organ for Lymph Node, Female, Left v1.1

subjects.subject: Lymph Node, Female, Left 3D Organ v1.1

descriptions.description: This reference organ was adapted using the Clearing-enhanced 3D (Ce3D) method developed by Dr. Weizhe Li, Laboratory of Immune System Biology, National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, NIH using data documented in https://www.pnas.org/content/114/35/E7321. While the size and cellular composition of mouse and human lymph nodes varies between species, the overall anatomy is well-conserved.

alternateIdentifiers.alternateIdentifier: Browne, Kristen, Leonard E. Cross, Bruce W. Herr II, Lisel Record, Ellen Quardokus, Andreas Bueckle, Katy Börner. 2021. HuBMAP CCF 3D Reference Object Library.https://hubmapconsortium.github.io/ccf/pages/ccf-3d-reference-library.html. Accessed on December 1, 2021.
